welcome_message_body: Welcome to Komae, Japan! Known for its beautiful cherry blossoms and charming traditional streets, we invite you to explore our city and immerse yourself in its unique culture and history. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Haneda Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Haneda Airport, serving primarily domestic flights within Japan.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights with a focus on low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration and have limited access time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for military and government flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
